name: Seil
caveats:
To install and/or use seil you may need to enable their kernel extension in

  System Preferences → Security & Privacy → General

For more information refer to vendor documentation or the Apple Technical Note:

  [4mhttps://developer.apple.com/library/content/technotes/tn2459/_index.html[24m

seil has been officially discontinued upstream.
It may stop working correctly (or at all) in recent versions of macOS.
